changeSet.sql:
IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM dbo.sysobjects WHERE id = object_id(N'dbo.remove_skill') AND OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsProcedure') = 1) DROP PROCEDURE dbo.remove_skill GO
CREATE PROCEDURE dbo.remove_skill @character_id dbo.id_t, @skill_code dbo.code_t AS SET NOCOUNT ON
DELETE FROM Skills WHERE character_id = @character_id AND skill_code = @skill_code
SET NOCOUNT OFF
